title: Blue Origin pauses space tourism flights to focus on lunar lander
description: Blue Origin, owned by billionaire Jeff Bezos, says it's stopping human spaceflights for at least two years. The move will allow it to "shift resources" to the company's lunar landing capabilities.
content:
